name: GeoGame
description:
GeoGame is a pixel art puzzle platformer created as a part of GeoJam 2022. It is a prototype of four tiled based levels each centered around a mechanic. The first is ladders, second is moving platforms, third is buttons, and fourth is doors and springs. 

Game Length: 

2 - 4 minutes

I hope you enjoy GeoGame! Can be played with controller or keyboard! :)
